TAMIL NADU GOVERNMENT GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY
MEMORANDUM REGARDING DELEGATED LEGISLATION
Clauses 1(2) 4(1)(d), 19 and 22 of the Bill authorize, the Government to prescribe the manner and the method if giving effect to certain provisions of the proposed Act, when enacted and brought into operation, by issuing suitable notifications or directions as the case may be.
2. The powers delegated are normal and not of an exceptional character.
DR. K. PONMUDY,
Minister for Higher Education.
M. SELVARAJ, Secretary.
